report.title: GMB Prospect Report
report.introductionDesc: Hello, Thank you for assessing your Google My Business (GMB) profile. Below are the results of our 10-point evaluation.
report.atAGlance: Your GMB Report at a Glance

competitor.title: Competitor Analysis
competitor.listingDesc: The listing outperforms or matches its competitors in key areas
competitor.why: standing out among competitors increase the chance of attraction more customer
competitor.recomendation: analyze competitor profile and focus on areas where they excel such as better rating or more details description.

citation.title: Citation Competitor Analysis
citation.why: Citations improve local SEO ranking and signal credibility
citation.recommendation: Identify citation gaps and submit your business to directories

summary.title: Summary of Recommendations
summary.li2: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews.
summary.li4: The logo is present and professional.
